about_the_game:
BIG LOOT - a roguelike adventure with survival elements about trading caravans. Explore the world, fill your expanding backpack with loot, and build the most influential trading company!

Travel with your caravan, uncover the secrets of a magical world, and become the richest trader. You'll face many challenges on the road, so first, survive and deliver your loot to the city, then we can talk about gold.

FEATURES:

  • Expanding backpack. Every item has value. Explore the world to fill your pockets and trade goods for gold or other valuables. But remember, your pockets have limits, and your backpack literally expands as it fills up. Moving with a lot of loot becomes difficult, and you might need to drop your backpack before a battle, for example. Be careful with that ;)

  • Caravan. Equip your wagon with various modules to carry even more loot! You can always craft or purchase new wheels, storage boxes, or even a new wagon body to upgrade your caravan

  • Trading. Discover local or rare wandering traders in towns to trade, sell, or buy items, armor, weapons, and more. Build your reputation through trading to unlock access to exclusive rare goods.

  • Gather resources. Wood, ores, leather, and other gatherable resources can be used in crafting, or if they’re not needed, they can always be traded for something better or for gold coins.

content_descriptors.notes: In the game, players can consume alcohol as an in-game item. Additionally, some characters may appear in their underwear

Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
